response.job_title: I Help you to speed up your projects, analize your data and build stuff with ai and machine learning. Let's Connect!
response.summary:
Open to work as:

1) Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Business analyst, Python developer, Python Engineer, Machine Learning specialist, artificial intelligence specialist. (Junior Positions)
2) Project Manager, Scrum Master, Product Owner. (Senior Positions)

Hello there! I am a passionate project manager and chemical engineer with more than 10 years of experience across various industries like pharmaceuticals, food, cleaning products, and water treatment plants. My goal is to achieve excellence in everything I do, and I am confident that I can exceed your expectations.

I have a broad understanding of project management methodologies, including Waterfall, Scrum, DDDM, among others. I can design, plan, execute, measure, control, and enhance projects with ease, and I am continually striving for improvement.

With my expertise in data analysis and mathematical modeling, I can use cutting-edge algorithms, classifications, clustering, data exploration, cleaning, automation, and scraping to deliver accurate predictions. As a professional certified in Scrum Master (PSM I), Product Owner (PSPO I), and SPS (Scaled Professional Scrum), I have the skills to forge strong relationships with key stakeholders and align strategies and plans to achieve clear visions.

I am also adept in using MS Office and statistical data analysis tools in Python, allowing me to develop conclusive forecasts and reports that support informed decision-making.

In summary, I am an intelligent, positive, focused, and energetic individual with excellent problem-solving skills. I am open to working as a junior Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Business Analyst, Python Developer, Python Engineer, Machine Learning Specialist, or Artificial Intelligence Specialist, and as a senior Project Manager, Scrum Master, or Product Owner. If you are looking for someone with a diverse skill set and an unwavering commitment to excellence, I am the ideal candidate for you.

Reach me on:

+81 08057307476
lavargasra@unal.edu.co
hello@alejandrovargas.co
alejandrovargas.co

company.name: ISS Facility Services Australia and New Zealand

profile_positions.company: ISS Facility Services Australia  and New Zealand
profile_positions.description:
-Manage and coordinate the provision of all Facilities Management services. 
-Coordinate subcontractors to service our sites based in Sydney. -Manage alarms / incidents at the above locations with the help of our team in Sydney. 
-Administration and data entry including asset management, contractor information, work order management and other ad hoc administration as required. 
-Compile reports and update databases for reporting purposes in a timely manner. 
-Act as the first point of contact for all day-to-day issues related to facilities / inquiries from contractors, suppliers, and internal and external customers. 
-Ensure compliance with ISS compliance standards covering occupational health and safety, quality and the environment and in accordance with Australian OHS standards and legislation. 
-Assist the Facilities Manager with administration, contract management, facilities management, and compliance-related tasks. 
-Management of the staff PaySlip in the Eastern area in Sydney. 
-Organization of Staff schedules and assignment of staff to different facilities.
profile_positions.title: Facilities & Maintenance Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Technical Director

-Keep all technical documentation related to the authorization of the warehouse, as well as the analysis protocols carried out in the establishment.
-Monitoring and control of the warehouse's procedures and analysis of the quality and purity of the products that are purchased in bulk.
-Verify compliance with the quality assurance standards applicable to the reception, packaging, labelling and retail distribution of products that are purchased in bulk.
-Guarantee the application and compliance with the correct distribution practices.
-Supervise compliance with the special legislation on narcotic drugs and psychotropics and demand the adoption of appropriate measures.

Production Manager

-Planning and supervising the work of employees.
-Supervision of manufacturing processes.
-Stock control and warehouse management.
-Resolution of incidents (such as machinery breakdowns, delays, quality, etc).
-Strategies to increase the efficiency and effectiveness of production.
-Lean Six Sigma.
profile_positions.title: Technical Director

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager

-Development of marketing initiatives, commercial proposals, technical support to clients.
- Data analysis, statistical tools, Monte-Carlo analysis.
-Long-term strategic management and task planning.
-Operational management based on economic factors.
-Planning of activities and evaluation of projects.
-Leading project planning sessions.
-Coordinating staff and internal resources.
-Managing project progress and adapt work as required.
-Ensuring projects meet deadlines.
-Managing relationships with clients and stakeholders.
-Designing and signing off on contracts.
-Overseeing all incoming and outgoing project documentation.
-Participating in tender process i.e. design, submission and review.
-Designing risk mitigation plan.
-Conducting project review and creating detailed reports for executive staff.
-Optimizing and improving processes and the overall approach where necessary.
profile_positions.title: Chemical Engineer - Water

profile_positions.description:
Analyst of laboratory  
-Quality control, stabilities, packaging material, raw materials, product in process and finished.
-Standards, validations, returns, calibration, HPLC.

Plant Supervisor
-Documentation, standard procedures, Internal audits – ISO.
-Equipment and products within the specifications.
-Supervision of process and variables.
profile_positions.title: Plant Supervisor
